column1: The haven of '''Rómenna''' was the main seaport of [[Númenor]] situated on its east coast, through which much of the traffic with the old lands of [[Middle-earth]] passed. Many of the [[Faithful]] were forced to relocate to Rómenna late in Númenor's history.

Rómenna was located in the region of [[Arandor]] about 50 miles east of the capital city of [[Armenelos]]. The port stood on the south side of the [[Firth of Rómenna]] which opened onto the [[Bay of Rómenna]] and then onto the Sea.<ref>{{UT

column2: Aldarion]] frequently came there and kept his ships in the harbour.
